abstract.t: This Internet-Draft describes NFS version 4 minor version two, focusing mainly on the protocol extensions made from NFS version 4 minor version 0 and NFS version 4 minor version 1. Major extensions introduced in NFS version 4 minor version two include: Server-side Copy, Application I/O Advise, Space Reservations, Sparse Files, Application Data Blocks, and Labeled NFS.
